meanings.sent1: The padronas of the house made sure everything was running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The padronas of the inn greeted guests with a warm smile.
meanings.sent3: The padronas of the kitchen ruled over pots and pans with a wooden spoon scepter.
meanings.sent4: She was the padronas of the office, her authority as solid as a castle wall.
meanings.sent5: The padronas of the farm knew every animal by name, a true queen of the land.
